wikipedia_page.main:
Veronica Burton (born 27 January 1952 in London) is a former professional tennis player.
Specialising on clay, Veronica remains the last English player to beat Martina Navratilova in a Grand Slam tournament in the 1973 U.S. Open - Women's Singles.
